    Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines - What is infrastructure as code?

    »

    1. Say you’ve written infrastructure code to automatically provision cloud resources for your application. Where’s the best place to store your code?

      On a network share.

      In source control, along with your application sources.

      In source control, in its own repository.


    2. Which of the following operations is not idempotent?

      Defining an Azure SQL database in a Resource Manager template.

      From a PowerShell script, using an If statement to add a firewall rule only when that rule does not exist.

      From a Bash script, appending a database server’s IP address to the /etc/hosts file.
